info.title: Cloud Services for RHEL Compliance API v2
info.description: This is the API for Cloud Services for RHEL Compliance. You can find out more about Red Hat Cloud Services for RHEL at [https://console.redhat.com/](https://console.redhat.com/)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of first item of paginated response

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Attribute and direction to sort the items by. Represented by an array of fields with an optional direction (`:asc` or `:desc`).

If no direction is selected, `:asc` is used by default.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Query string to filter items by their attributes. Compliant with scoped_search query language. However, only `=` or `!=` (resp. `<>`) operators are supported.

Profiles are searchable using attributes `title` and `ref_id`

(e.g.: `(version=0.1.47 AND os_major_verision=8)`)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of first item of paginated response

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Attribute and direction to sort the items by. Represented by an array of fields with an optional direction (`:asc` or `:desc`).

If no direction is selected, `:asc` is used by default.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Query string to filter items by their attributes. Compliant with scoped_search query language. However, only `=` or `!=` (resp. `<>`) operators are supported.

Security Guides are searchable using attributes `title`, `version`, `ref_id`, and `os_major_version`

(e.g.: `(version=0.1.47 AND os_major_verision=8)`)

limit.description: Number of items returned per page

offset.description: Offset of the first item of paginated response

sort_by.description: Attribute and direction the items are sorted by

examples: title='Standard System Security Profile for Fedora'
filter.description: Query string used to filter items by their attributes

examples: CIS Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Benchmark
This profile defines a baseline that aligns to the Center for Internet Security®Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Benchmark™, v2.2.0, released 12-27-2017.
Guide to the Secure Configuration of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
title.description: Short title of the Security Guide

examples: This guide presents a catalog of security-relevant configuration settings for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.
description.description: Longer description of the Security Guide

os_major_version.description: Major version of the Operating System that the Security Guide covers
